statement: SELECT (CASE WHEN h.consumer_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Name & Address' ELSE 'Address Only' END) as "Type", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY h.consumer_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY h.consumer_id IS NOT NULL DESC

SELECT 'Records with SQFT' as "Type", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 AND h.sqft IS NOT NULL AND h.sqft > 0

SELECT h.scf, sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY scf ORDER BY h.scf

SELECT dwelling as "Dwelling", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY dwelling ORDER BY h.dwelling

SELECT c.gender as "Gender", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total"  FROM premover.homes h INNER JOIN us_consumer.consumers c ON c.id = h.consumer_id WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY c.gender ORDER BY c.gender

SELECT c.ethnicity as "Ethnicity", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h INNER JOIN us_consumer.consumers c ON c.id = h.consumer_id WHERE sold = false AND h.aging <= 120 GROUP BY c.ethnicity ORDER BY c.ethnicity

SELECT sales_amount_code as "Sale Ammount", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY h.sales_amount_code ORDER BY h.sales_amount_code

SELECT state as "State", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY h.state ORDER BY h.state

SELECT state as "State", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 AND h.consumer_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY h.state ORDER BY h.state

SELECT state as "State", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 AND h.consumer_id IS NULL GROUP BY h.state ORDER BY h.state

SELECT property_description as "Property Description", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY h.property_description ORDER BY h.property_description

SELECT county_code, county as "County", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY h.county_code, h.county ORDER BY h.county_code

SELECT msa_code as "MSA Code", msa as "MSA", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "30", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "60", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "90", sum(CASE WHEN h.aging = 120 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "120", count(*) AS "Total" FROM premover.homes h WHERE sold = false AND aging <= 120 GROUP BY h.msa_code, h.msa ORDER BY h.msa_code
